resources.string: Ele be woawɔ mɔɖeɖe ɖe teƒe si wole ŋu
Ele be nàxɔ mɔɖeɖe ɖe teƒe si nèle ŋu hafi Securitly nate ŋu awɔ dɔ
Hi, nyee nye Emma, \u200b\u200bnye batri ku.
Ele be Securitly nanya afi si nèle ɣesiaɣi

Ðe nèdi be yeana teƒe si nèle la nawɔ dɔa?
Yi Ðoɖowo -> Dɔwɔɖoɖowo -> Securitly -> Ðe mɔ ɖe teƒe si nèle ŋu ɣesiaɣi.

Emegbe gbugbɔ dze Securitly gɔme
Mètia ame siwo nàte ŋu aƒo ka na o
SMS do kpo eɖoɖo ɖe amewo
Ðo gbedasi kpata ɖa ne batri ƒe sesẽme le
Èka ɖe edzi be yedi be yeagbugbɔ aɖo nyatakaka gbãtɔwoa?
Batriki ƒe alafa memamã suetɔ kekeake nye 2% .
Batriki ƒe alafa memamã si sɔ gbɔ wue nye 100% .
Taflatse miɖe xexlẽdzesi aɖe ɖe go
David Martínez ƒe ŋkɔe nye esia
Ðe nèdi be yeatutu kadodo sia ɖa le wò kadodowo ƒe xexlẽdzesiwo mea?
Taflatse kpe "Telefon xexlẽdzesi" ƒe akpaa ɖo
1. Ele be Securitly nanya afi si nèle ɣesiaɣi. Be nàte ŋu awɔ ema la, yi wò mɔ̃a ƒe ɖoɖowo -> dɔwɔɖoɖowo -> Securitly -> Mɔɖeɖewo eye nàtrɔ teƒea ƒe mɔɖeɖe ɖe "Ðe mɔ ɣesiaɣi" ŋu.
2.Mègazi Securitly dzi o. Ne menye nenema o la, womaɖo wò gbedasi si nèdi kpata la ɖe ame siwo nèdo ka kplii o.
3. Míeɖo aɖaŋu be nàɖo batri ƒe sesẽme si dzi nàɖo wò gbedasi si nèdi kpata la ɖe 1 alo 2% o, elabena wò mɔ̃a ate ŋu atsi hafi aɖo gbedasi la ɖa.

Sukuvi 5 siwo tso Mɔ̃ɖaŋununyasrɔ̃ƒe si le Laguna, Mexico, ye wɔ dɔwɔnu sia. Dɔ sia dze egɔme abe susu aɖe si míeɖo be míana wòava eme ene, eye míewɔ ɖeka kple míaƒe aɖaŋuɖola, mɔ̃ɖaŋudɔwɔla Gerardo, míena wòte ŋu dzɔ. Míele mɔ kpɔm be míatsɔ app sia akpe asi ɖe nɔnɔme si le xexeame fifia ŋu vie.

Teƒe mamlɛtɔ si nye mɔ̃a le enye:
latitude ƒe didime:
40.776570 ƒe xexlẽme
didime: -73.969979
Central Park Ɣetoɖoƒe Ŋutinya Nutome
New York, ƒe 10024, E. E. UU.
Securitly mateŋu awɔ dɔ o elabena womeɖe mɔ na "Send SMS" o
Securitly mateŋu awɔ dɔ o elabena womeɖe mɔ na "Always Location" o. Ele be Securitly nanya afi si nèle ale be wòate ŋu aɖo wò teƒe mamlɛtɔ si nènya ɖe ame siwo nètia
Vodada aɖe dzɔ le mɔ̃ sia ƒe teƒe si wodzro la xɔxɔ me
Mègaɖe "teƒe si wobia" si ado la afia ne Securitly dze egɔme o
